mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.service_name AS "serviceName", a.service_description AS "serviceDescription", a.service_type AS "serviceType", a.service_class AS "serviceClass", a.service_image AS "serviceImage", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_service( id, service_name, service_description, service_type, service_class, service_image, remarks, update_by, create_by, update_date, del_flag, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{serviceName}, #{serviceDescription}, #{serviceType}, #{serviceClass}, #{serviceImage}, #{remarks}, #{updateBy}, #{createBy}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_service SET service_name = #{serviceName}, service_description = #{serviceDescription}, service_type = #{serviceType}, service_class = #{serviceClass}, service_image = #{serviceImage}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
